import React from 'react'; import '../pages/user/UserPage.css'; function UserOffers() { [UserOffer,setUserOffer]=useState({ offers_loaded:false, data:{} }) useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/getAllOffers") .then(res => { if(res.data.success===true){ setAdminData({ offers_loaded: true,data_offers:res.data.data }); console.log('offers loaded '); }else { setAdminData({ offers_loaded: false,data_offers:"Error in loading data" }); } }) }, []); return ( <>
